```{r, setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "man/figures",
  fig.width = 10,
  asciicast_theme = if (Sys.getenv("IN_PKGDOWN") == "true") "pkgdown" else "readme"
)
asciicast::init_knitr_engine(
  echo = TRUE,
  echo_input = FALSE,
  startup = quote({
    library(cli)
    options(cli.num_colors = cli::truecolor)
  })
)
```
